name: PertussisTestPanelsForBordetellaPertussisAntibody
title: Pertussis (Test Panels for Bordetella pertussis Antibody)
purpose:
(Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test panels associated with detecting the presence of Bordetella pertussis antibody.),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed.),(Inclusion Criteria: B. pertussis antibody panel test;  

LOINC search: “(bordetella or pertussis) Ab panel -toxin -donor -interpretation”),(Exclusion Criteria: none)
